p: We performed most assays with the same mammalian expression vector for EBOV/Mak-C15 NP and its mutants, except where indicated. We synthesized EBOV NP-R111 in 2 dsDNA gBlocks (Integrated DNA Technologies [IDT], Coralville, IA) and cloned these gBlocks into pGL4.23-CMV [ 15] modified with a C-terminal V5 peptide tag. To generate all NP mutants, we performed a modified site-directed mutagenesis (SDM) protocol, as described in [ 15]. For many assays, we expressed enhanced green fluorescent protein (eGFP) in cells in place of NP as a negative control. We generated the corresponding vector by cloning eGFP into pcDNA3.3-CMV (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA) modified by an in-frame C-terminal V5 peptide tag.
